Package it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.client

Class ClientSideMethods

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.client.ClientSideMethods
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientRemoteInterface, Remote
public class ClientSideMethods extends Object implements ClientRemoteInterface
Class that implements the methods for the RMI client interface
